00034 struct intrusive_list_node
00035 {
00036         intrusive_list_node * next;
00037         intrusive_list_node * prev;
00038         
00039         intrusive_list_node() : next(this), prev(this)
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00043         void insert(intrusive_list_node * const p)
00044         {
00045                 p->next = this;
00046                 p->prev = prev;
00047                 
00048                 prev->next = p;
00049                 prev = p;
00050         }
00051 
00052     void erase()
00053         {
00054                 prev->next = next;
00055                 next->prev = prev;
00056                 
00057                 next = this;
00058                 prev = this;
00059         }
00060         
00061         ~intrusive_list_node()
00062         {
00063                 erase();
00064         }
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 class intrusive_list_base
00069 {
00070 protected:
00071         intrusive_list_node impl;
00072 
00073         void clear()
00074         {
00075                 impl.next = & impl;
00076                 impl.prev = & impl;
00077         }
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00089 class intrusive_list : protected intrusive_list_base
00090 {
00091         typedef intrusive_list_base                                             base;
00092 
00093 public:
00094         typedef intrusive_list_node                                             node;
00095         typedef intrusive_list_node *                                   pointer;
00096         template <typename T, intrusive_list_node T::* P> 
00097                 struct iterator;
00098 
00099 protected:
00100         using base::impl;
00101 
00102 public:
00103         pointer begin()                                                                 { return impl.next; }
00104         pointer end()                                                                   { return & impl; }
00105 
00106         bool empty() const                                                              { return impl.next == & impl; }
00107         
00108         void push_front(pointer i)
00109         {
00110                 begin()->insert(i);
00111         }
00112         
00113         void push_back(pointer i)
00114         {
00115                 end()->insert(i);
00116         }
00117         
00118         void merge(intrusive_list& x)
00119         {
00120                 if (! x.empty())
00121                 {
00122                         x.impl.prev->next = impl.next;
00123                         impl.next->prev = x.impl.prev;
00124                         
00125                         impl.next = x.impl.next;
00126                         x.impl.next->prev = & impl;
00127 
00128                         x.clear();
00129                 }
00130         }
00131 };

00134 template <typename T, intrusive_list_node T::* P>
00135         struct intrusive_list::iterator
00136         {
00137                 typedef iterator                                                        self_type;
00138                 typedef intrusive_list_node                             node_type;
00139 
00140                 iterator() : node_()                                                    {}
00141                 iterator(intrusive_list::pointer __x) : node_(__x) {}
00142 
00143                 T & operator * () const                                                 { return * roofof(P, node_); }
00144                 T * operator -> () const                                                { return roofof(P, node_); }
00145 
00146                 self_type & operator ++ ()
00147                 {
00148                         node_ = node_->next;
00149                         return * this;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 self_type & operator -- ()
00153                 {
00154                         node_ = node_->prev;
00155                         return * this;
00156                 }
00157 
00158                 bool operator == (const self_type & x) const    { return node_ == x.node_; }
00159                 bool operator != (const self_type & x) const    { return node_ != x.node_; }
00160 
00161                 node_type * node_;
00162         };
